title: [FEATURE] Reduce heap allocation on SKManagedStream.OnReadManagedStream
body: I've found a big heap allocation on images decode at `SKManagedStream.OnReadManagedStream`. ![Screenshot 2020-09-25 at 23 50 48](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4997065/94314864-20dac780-ff8a-11ea-8f89-4821d18f7aec.png) Maybe it would be better to use a 81920 bytes length buffer to copy a managed stream data to unmanaged pointer? I hope Marshal.Copy cost is not huge.
